name: Heated Eyelash Curlers, 2 in 1 Clip-Type Eyelash Curler, Natural Curling 24 Hours Long Lasting, 3 Temperature Modes with USB Rechargeable, Gift for Women Girls (Black)

other_info.Included Components: User Manual, Brush, USB Charging Cable

about_this_item: 【Attractive and fast curling】：The lash curler can fast heat up within 10s and the curved curling head quickly creates a perfect, natural curl for your eyes. Lasts up to 24 hours.

【Adjust Temperature Accurately】：Our heated eyelash curler comes with 3 temperature settings from 60°c to 80°c to gently curl your lashes and create stunning curls for different types of lashes without frizzing or pinching them.

【How to use】： Press the root of eyelashes and stay for about 5-10 seconds. Brush to the middle of the eyelashes and press again for about 5-10 seconds. Then press the end of the eyelashes and stay for about 5-10 seconds. Repeat 5-8 times.

【Rechargeable Portable】:Fast charging and easy to carry , Rechargeable heated eyelash curler has a slim and compact design, perfect for carrying on the go. It is a must-have in every girl's makeup bag.

【Safe and Harmless】：The double-sided anti-scalding comb teeth are safe and do not harm the skin, and the lashes are protected from the grooves through the bumps so that they are curled without damaging the eyelids.
【Tips & Tricks】:Apply mascara repeatedly to the roots of the lashes, move to the roots of the lashes and curl them upwards. Repeat 3-4 times, then apply another coat of mascara to define the look.
【A perfect gift】：This innovative heated eyelash curler is the perfect Valentine's Day/Thanksgiving/Christmas and birthday gift for your loved ones.

title: Great tool for curl
content: I was skeptical at first about using a heated eyelash curler, but this product completely changed my routine! It heats up quickly, and the temperature settings are perfect for getting a natural lift without damaging my lashes. The design is ergonomic, making it easy to hold and use, even if you’re a beginner.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Unlike traditional curlers, this one doesn’t pinch or crimp my lashes. I love how it provides a long-lasting curl, even on days when I skip mascara. It’s also compact and great for traveling. The battery life is decent, and it’s super easy to recharge.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2024

title: Great Eyelash Curler
content: My only suggestion would be to include a protective cap for better storage, but other than that, this heated curler is a game-changer for anyone looking for a little extra oomph in their beauty routine!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have straight Asian lashes that don’t curl easily.  This heated eyelash curler helps to curl them nicely.  There was a bit of a learning curve, but once I got it, it works great.  I heat the curler up & use it to push my lashes up a few times.  After, I put on a couple of coats of my favorite mascara, then use the heated eyelash curler again by opening it & “clipping” my lashes in between the “jaws”.  I gently pull out & up in a curling motion to make sure my lashes curl nice. I’ve gotten compliments on my lashes where people think I’ve had a lash perm or even extensions.  I make sure to wipe down my eyelash curler as it’s cooling down so there isn’t any mascara left on it before I put it away.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2024

title: Great Eyelash Curler

Simply clip it around your lashes and move upwards in a curling motion and the magic is complete. It looks like salon-level results but without the salon-level prices! The battery lasts quite a while before needing to be recharged as well, but most importantly, I am saving a fortune on false lashes and all that jazz! 5/5

title: Heated eyelash curler
content: The curler arrived promptly and was beautifully packaged. It heats up in about 30 seconds, which is incredibly convenient for my busy mornings. As I used it, I noticed that it created a gentle, natural-looking curl that opened up my eyes beautifully. The best part is curls lasted all day without drooping. One concern I had was the safety aspect. Thankfully, this curler has a temperature control function to prevent overheating. I felt safe using it, which is crucial for any heated device. Compared to my old manual curler, this heated version is a revelation. No more crimped lashes or uncomfortable pinching.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2024

title: Verified Purchase

content: I waited a bit to review simply because I just wasn't seeing the results I wanted to. For awhile I ended up using this to pull through my lashes to warm them, then curling with a typical lash curler. Finally, I came across a TikTok video and realized I was doing it all wrong. You clamp your lashes at the base and instead of pulling up you twist/roll it towards your eye lid without moving the actually placement or the wand. Since I happened across that video and started using it correctly, I'm really loving it! Gets nice and warm but not too hot as long as you don't accidently pinch your eye lid. Soooo glad I went with this one with the clamp because I don't see the ones that simply brush through giving much curl.

content: This is my favorite eyelash curler I used!  And for the price, it is amazing!  It looks high end! I keep it on setting 1 when warming it up.  Whithin 2 minutes you can use it.  If it does get really warm, you can turn it off and still use it.  And it will cool off soon.  To turn on and off just hold in the button for a few seconds.  My eyelashes looked amazing!  For a better lash lift, just apply 1 coating of your favorite mascara, then do the eyelash heater then apply the rest of the mascara when you are done.

title: Easy to use
